title: Dressed
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, International, Western, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A quick service cafe concept originating in Atlanta Georgia, that serves fresh salads, artisan sandwiches, paninis, wraps, pastas, soups, and smoothies, with vegan choices. You can select from a variety of chef-designed recipes as well as customize your own meals from 76 toppings and 23 dressings.
